text_block_list.name: Game NPC
text_block_list.text: Mnmomn… curry… shg- good… monchnomch… pfaaah! … Hoowee～～～! That was delicious!

text_block_list.name: Game NPC
text_block_list.text:
Sorry about this! 
But thanks to you I feel alive again!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad you are feeling better. But… just how 
did you come to collapse from hunger like that?

text_block_list.name: Game NPC
text_block_list.text:
Uuuhh… I was so engrossed in my research, 
I just kinda forgot to eat. Ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Research? What kind!?

text_block_list.name: Game NPC
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, I'm so glad you asked! You see—

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: ―I'm working on a new airplane!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
New airplane!? You're making airplanes!? 
That's awesome! Show Turbo!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey but… I have airplane piloting skills… 
So that means airplanes already exist, right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Mmm, we saw some on the way here. Their wooden wings 
made them look like toys. I take it those are the old ones?

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
That's right. Those only fly a short distance. 
I'm developing airplanes that can fly much 
higher, and further! Made of iron!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Iron… Can that actually fly? Everything here works on 
steam engines doesn't it? The engine alone would weigh—

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Of course it can!! I've seen one fly!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
A plane of iron was heading towards the mountains! 
Those enormous mountains around the city! 
I couldn't stop watching, to see if it could fly over them!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
I ran after it as fast as I could! And I asked to be 
master's apprentice when he landed!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
It dawned on me then… staring at those planes. That I didn't 
know anything about the world beyond those mountains.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
We have cars and locomotives, so travel and distribution 
isn't an issue. But there are no roads or railways leading 
beyond the mountains.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Nobody knows what lies further than those peaks… 
And I want to see what it is!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
And I want to tell everyone about it! I want to inspire them! 
That's why I wanna cross the mountains with a plane of iron!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uo… Uuooooaaahh!! I get youuuu! I so get how you feeeel～～!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
To follow your ambitions! And inspire everyone 
to do the same! We have the same dream!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
To think you were so invested you collapsed from hunger… 
That's so amaszuiiiing～～! I'm so toouuwcheeedd～～!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You really absolutely have to make that dream 
come true for real!! We'll help out too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … Figures.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
'Cause!! Can't you see how hard she's trying!? 
Don't you wanna cheer her on!!?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Doubtless, until she collapses in the street. 
I think she could use someone to support her.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… You know, we're playing a game he―

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Sure, but you know! This is probably a mission, right? So even 
in game teeerms… It's our way forward, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … You saying we should cooperate with this woman? Haa… agh, whatever.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Turbo's here for it! Turbo will help too!! 
I wanna build a plane! And brrrrrr over the mountains!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That does it then. With 5 new aides I am sure you will be able 
to do your research with proper meals and sleep.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Fo- For real…? You'll all help me out…?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah!! I want to support your dream! 
Let us help you build your plane!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
…… Ah, we have a new mission. 
"Help the researcher fulfil her dreams"… You were right.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoaa! So this is your workshop!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Wooaaooaaoh! Here's the plane being built! There's no seat! And all the machiney bits are visible inside! Heeee～～!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
T-Turbo! Don't carelessly too——ouuucch! 
… That was… close……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
… Hmm? There's no one else here? 
Where's that "master" person?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Didn't you say you asked to be that airplane creator's 
apprentice after you chased his plane?

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Ah, master… has retired… I'm the only one here now.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You're doing all this by yourself!? 
No wonder you're falling over!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
…… Actually, I've not really touched most of this… 
I can't find time to raise funds and my research is just 
barely getting done… eheheh.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Uuooooo～～n! Don't force yourself to do it all alone! 
We're here to help you nooowwww!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: We'll do whatever it takes to finish that plaaneeee…!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
For the time being, you need funds most? It will be 
troublesome to even buy parts without money after all.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Then let's help raise some funds! …I'm pretty sure you 
get paid for doing requests for townspeople, so let's do that!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… Alright, I can likely handle any repair requests.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'll do deliveries!! We'll have money in no time with 
all the packages I'm about to move! And it'll 
make the townfolk happy to boot!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey Hayahide, what else is there? 
What's Turbo doing?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm…… We have no jobs, so I presume we should take 
advantage of our inherent skills? Alright, let's make a plan.
